vulnerable.commit_message:
LZWDecodeCompat(): fix potential index-out-of-bounds write. Fixes http://bugzilla.maptools.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2780 / CVE-2018-8905

The fix consists in using the similar code LZWDecode() to validate we
don't write outside of the output buffer.
vulnerable.cve_desc: In LibTIFF 4.0.9, a heap-based buffer overflow occurs in the function LZWDecodeCompat in tif_lzw.c via a crafted TIFF file, as demonstrated by tiff2ps.
